title: I hate everyone in Solo Q.

replies.body: Don't we all? I get more bad games with trolls, feeders, AFK, the usual than I do good. And when I do get a good game, it only takes one person thinking they are superman to ruin it and go yolo mode.

> [{quoted}](name=akaRaven,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bF0EEIq6,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-06T15:16:13.367+0000)
>
> Don't we all? I get more bad games with trolls, feeders, AFK, the usual than I do good. And when I do get a good game, it only takes one person thinking they are superman to ruin it and go yolo mode.

Haha, like that Lee Sin who has to always "JUST TAKE THE SHOT!".

> [{quoted}](name=Bookbash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bF0EEIq6,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-09-07T16:40:36.561+0000)
>
> Haha, like that Lee Sin who has to always "JUST TAKE THE SHOT!".

Ugh don't remind me. I had one of those the other day, in the same game he went yolo mode three times, once he Q'd into the 5 of them alone so I went in to allow him to dash to me, that failed, we both died horribly.

The second time he went yolo mode towards Baron and than B back to base when he realised we had all just died, to yolo again into the 5 of them.

Don't worry IMAGINARY TRIBUNAL WILL COME SOON!

riot hasn't cared since 2013, as long as kids are buying riot points they won't give a fk
